outputs.output_descr: This project is aimed to support the Government of Turkmenistan in the development and implementation of new accounting system through modification of the regulatory and legislative frameworks to support its successful functioning, and by providing training to strengthen accounting capacities based on international best practices. The project would also aim to strengthen capacities of the government in the field of audit and financial control.

project_descr: Support in modernization of accounting system of Turkmenistan and in introducing international standards of accounting and reporting
